title: Ashes archive: Boland takes 6-7 as he rips through England on debut
text:
Scott Boland takes an astonishing 6-7 on his Test debut at the Melbourne Cricket Ground during the 2021-22 Ashes.

Listen to ball-by-ball commentary from the Ashes on BBC Sounds and watch the best of the action on the BBC Sport app and BBC iPlayer.

Available to UK users only.
summary: Scott Boland takes an astonishing 6-7 on his Test debut at the Melbourne Cricket Ground during the 2021-22 Ashes.
